text:
What's up, Mikoto?
What are you doing up so late?

──Producer-san.
I was practicing on my own until just now.

I see, you're dedicated…
Is the joint training going smoothly?
Yes, there are no major issues.

That's a relief.
Well, with you, I guess there's nothing to worry about.

While everyone can influence each other positively,
I organized this joint training…

Even on your own,
you can have fulfilling lessons, right, Mikoto?

Do you think so?
There's always something to learn from those around you.

──Mikoto, if you get the chance,
could you teach something to everyone?
